settings.content: Being a brand that is chiefly run by 4 amazing fashion designers, the brand soon went on to open multiple designer stores in the heart of Kolkata with clients across the world. Even though the four Directors & Fashion Designers, Abhilasha Kajaria, Shweta Malpani, Rashmi Malpani & Neha Malpani had a modest start, it was their hard work, talent & determination that has made Affaires by Levell 5 as one of Kolkataâ€™s leading Women Clothing Couture for Ethnic & Indo-Western wear.
